title: Driver shot in possible road-rage incident in North Hollywood
content:
A man was shot while driving in North Hollywood Friday, and investigators say it may have been a possible road-rage incident. 
The victim was shot near the intersection of Laurel Canyon Boulevard and Sherman Way around midnight. 

He was transported to a local hospital in stable condition. 

So far, no arrests have been made. The suspect's vehicle was described as a black four-door sedan with a broken headlight. 

Anyone with additional information was asked to contact the Los Angeles Police Department's North Hollywood Division.
